CompensationExplanationGrp.ShortExplanationTxt: *ABS LEGACY PARTNERS, A FIRM OWNED BY AN OFFICER OF THE PATRICK BEAVER SCHOLARSHIP FOUNDATION ("THE FOUNDATION") WAS COMPENSATED BY THE FOUNDATION TO PROVIDE MANAGEMENT SERVICES. THIS COMPENSATION IS REPORTED ON PART I, LINE 16C TO BE CONSISTENT WITH THE CHARACTER OF THE EXPENSE. THE FIRM BILLED THE FOUNDATION AT OR BELOW MARKET RATES
